price: Yoo nama miidhame ta’e malee Rabbiin jecha irraa hamaa ifa baasuu hin jaalatu. Rabbiinis dhagayaa, beekaa ta'eera.
arabic: ۞ لَّا يُحِبُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ إِلَّا مَن ظُلِمَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًا عَلِيمًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yuḥibbu al-lahu al-jahra bil-sūi mina al-qawli illā man ẓulima wakāna al-lahu samīʿan ʿalīman
